attributes.action: All new public sector employees join personal pension scheme due to start in 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With so much debt and liabilities built up public sector employees must join private sector in pension planning. New employees should not be guaranteed gold plated pensions paid by everyone else. Gordon Brown and Labour want everyone to be treated equally and so all new public sector employees should join the personal pension scheme after it is created.
